markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Venom Draw](/Actions.aspx?ID=1452) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 60</row>

**Requirements** Your [Envenom](/Actions.aspx?ID=1451) action hasn't been expended.

</column>

---

You quickly envenom poisonous saliva on your weapon as you draw it. Interact to draw a weapon, and then Envenom it. This uses up your daily use of Envenom.
name: Venom Draw
requirement: Your  Envenom  action hasn't been expended.
